item.title: Setup pivx masternode [Draft]
item.description: 相关链接 https://pivx.org/knowledge-base/masternode-setup-guide/ https://masternode-setup.com/pivx/ https://masternode-setup.com/pivx/hot-cold-vps.html 流程介绍 1. 在Mac上安装PIVX钱包，这个钱包称之为Control wallet或者Hot wallet 2. 在Ubuntu VPS上搭建Mast
